title: A1278 820-2879-B no backlight
message:
Hi,

I have an A1278 820-2879-B with no backlight that always powers on by it self when the charger is connected.

When i get the chime, the screen blanks white, and then loses backlight. 

On external monitor i get image, and i can see the login screen on the internal display with a lantern.

Can you help?
